detaileddescription.para: Reset the current absolute position to be the same as the Rotation Sensor angle.

This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Rotation Sensor

simplesect.para: 1 if the operation was successful or PROS_ERR if the operation failed, setting errno.

detaileddescription.para: Reset the current absolute position to be the same as the Rotation Sensor angle.

This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Rotation Sensor

simplesect.para: 1 if the operation was successful or PROS_ERR if the operation failed, setting errno.

detaileddescription.para: Reset the current absolute position to be the same as the Rotation Sensor angle.

This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Rotation Sensor

simplesect.para: 1 if the operation was successful or PROS_ERR if the operation failed, setting errno.

briefdescription.para: Set the Rotation Sensor's refresh interval in milliseconds.

detaileddescription.para: The rate may be specified in increments of 5ms, and will be rounded down to the nearest increment. The minimum allowable refresh rate is 5ms. The default rate is 10ms.

As values are copied into the shared memory buffer only at 10ms intervals, setting this value to less than 10ms does not mean that you can poll the sensor's values any faster. However, it will guarantee that the data is as recent as possible.

This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Rotation Sensor

parameterdescription.para: The data refresh interval in milliseconds

simplesect.para: 1 if the operation was successful or PROS_ERR if the operation failed, setting errno.

briefdescription.para: Set the Rotation Sensor position reading to a desired rotation value.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Rotation Sensor

parameterdescription.para: The position in terms of ticks

simplesect.para: 1 if the operation was successful or PROS_ERR if the operation failed, setting errno.

briefdescription.para: Reset the Rotation Sensor to a desired rotation value.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Rotation Sensor

parameterdescription.para: The position in terms of ticks

simplesect.para: 1 if the operation was successful or PROS_ERR if the operation failed, setting errno.

briefdescription.para: Get the Rotation Sensor's current position in centidegrees.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Rotation Sensor

simplesect.para: The position value or PROS_ERR if the operation failed, setting errno.

briefdescription.para: Get the Rotation Sensor's current velocity in centidegrees per second.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Rotation Sensor

parameterdescription.para: The V5 Rotation Sensor port number from 1-21

simplesect.para: The value or PROS_ERR_F if the operation failed, setting errno.

briefdescription.para: Get the Rotation Sensor's current position in centidegrees.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Rotation Sensor

simplesect.para: The angle value or PROS_ERR if the operation failed, setting errno.

briefdescription.para: Set the Rotation Sensor's direction reversed flag.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Rotation Sensor

parameterdescription.para: Determines if the direction of the rotational sensor is reversed or not.

simplesect.para: 1 if the operation was successful or PROS_ERR if the operation failed, setting errno.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Rotation Sensor

simplesect.para: 1 if the operation was successful or PROS_ERR if the operation failed, setting errno.

briefdescription.para: Get the Rotation Sensor's reversed flag.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Rotation Sensor

simplesect.para: Reversed value or PROS_ERR if the operation failed, setting errno.
